ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Functions and data accompanying the second edition of the book  "Data Mining with R, learning with case studies" by Luis Torgo, published by CRC Press.
Functions and data accompanying the second edition of the book  "Data Mining with R, learning with case studies" by Luis Torgo, published by CRC Press.

name: r-dmwr2
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '0.0.2' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-dmwr2
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/DMwR2_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/DMwR2/DMwR2_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 2902e83a8bd8b37c478c71eba005b436a7b4f2136dbc78a1c8481630c55feeef

build:
  number: 4
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-dbi >=0.5
    - r-class >=7.3_14
    - r-dplyr >=0.4.3
    - r-quantmod >=0.4_5
    - r-readr >=1.0.0
    - r-rpart >=4.1_10
    - r-xts >=0.9_7
    - r-zoo >=1.7_10
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-dbi >=0.5
    - r-class >=7.3_14
    - r-dplyr >=0.4.3
    - r-quantmod >=0.4_5
    - r-readr >=1.0.0
    - r-rpart >=4.1_10
    - r-xts >=0.9_7
    - r-zoo >=1.7_10

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('DMwR2')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('DMwR2')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/ltorgo/DMwR2
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  summary: Functions and data accompanying the second edition of the book  "Data Mining with
    R, learning with case studies" by Luis Torgo, published by CRC Press.
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: DMwR2
# Type: Package
# Title: Functions and Data for the Second Edition of "Data Mining with R"
# Description: Functions and data accompanying the second edition of the book  "Data Mining with R, learning with case studies" by Luis Torgo, published by CRC Press.
# Version: 0.0.2
# Depends: R(>= 3.0), methods
# Imports: xts (>= 0.9-7), zoo (>= 1.7-10), class (>= 7.3-14), rpart (>= 4.1-10), quantmod (>= 0.4-5), dplyr (>= 0.4.3), readr (>= 1.0.0), DBI (>= 0.5)
# Date: 2016-10-12
# Authors@R: person("Luis", "Torgo", email = "ltorgo@dcc.fc.up.pt", role = c("aut", "cre"))
# URL: https://github.com/ltorgo/DMwR2
# BugReports: https://github.com/ltorgo/DMwR2/issues
# License: GPL (>= 2)
# LazyLoad: yes
# LazyData: yes
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2016-10-12 13:32:44 UTC; ltorgo
# Author: Luis Torgo [aut, cre]
# Maintainer: Luis Torgo <ltorgo@dcc.fc.up.pt>
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2016-10-13 00:23:37
